thread.title: Mr Paul
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Mr Paul

author: Mr Paul
title: Mr Paul
text: Since installing the system I am satisfied with the quality of the system as well as the taste of the water. Although a DIY could install it I chose to avoid this by hiring a local plumber who was familiar with the system. I was replacing a slat system which i did not enjoy.l
